name: Rogue Advanced Talents and Ninja Master Tricks

sections.benefit: A slayer can select one of the following rogue advanced talents or ninja master tricks in place of a slayer advanced talent. Any talent effects based on rogue or ninja level use the slayer's class level. This talent can be selected multiple times; each time, it grants the slayer a new rogue advanced talent or ninja master trick, but a slayer can't select the same one more than once.
